Metadata.Title: Administrative Interfaces Are Enumerated And Secured
Metadata.DirectLink: Administrative Interfaces Are Enumerated And Secured

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that the administrative interfaces are enumerated and secured when securing your network switches.

How to Check

Use Terminal Access Controller Access Control System (TACACS) or Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) authentication for highly secure environments as a means of limiting administrative access to the network.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
